name: Mason (Niven Hedinger)
description:
Are you the killer or are you an innocent person? Play and find out. 
Mason is a hyper short, story driven interactive fiction. It is a linier experience with the atmosphere and dialogue. Towards the end, little bit of walking. Enjoy the game. 
Please, write down comments, criticisms and suggestion for the game. This is just a prototype, not a fully made game. Thanks for support and time. 

SPECIAL THANKS TO TIFFANY GILLEY - inspired the game with the name. 

Controls:

Interaction/Use

LMB

Movement

W,A,S,D
